Windlord::

Winloed opened his comlink, "Kup, Kup have you arrived?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> 
> Just as Azure had said that, Kup pulled into the Maximal base.
> 
> Kup: Jump out, we're here. We need to check on Nightlight.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > AzureBlade: Don't... (he gasps) aagh!
> > 
> > He closes his eyes and focuses on his spark. It was as if there 
was 
> a 
> > mix of a distress call with a cry of fury emanating from a 
single 
> > point and hitting his spark like a tidal wave crashing on rocks.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: By all the Matrix and the sparks in it! Kup! Get to 
> > Maximal base and fast!
> >

wrote:
> > > : : Kup : :
> > > 
> > > Kup: Hmm, I hope that it causes permanent damage rather then 
just 
> > > temporary...

> > >

wrote:

the

in
